tool_description: Cheap and afordable QRcode generator with logo. Output image or base64 string
name: Easy QRcode Logo
title: Easy QRcode Logo

api_list.name: QRCode image
api_list.description: This end point takes a "GET" request with url as a parameter and returns qr code image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-qrcode-logo.p.rapidapi.com/generate-qr-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-qrcode-logo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-qrcode-logo.p.rapidapi.com/generate-qr-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-qrcode-logo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
